cu.explanation_en: Setting the IPv4 address for NG AMF to 127.0.0.1 (loopback) will cause wrong routing definitions since the AMF is expected to be on a different network segment, leading to unreachable AMF and connection failures.

du.explanation_en: Setting the local N address to 127.0.0.1 (loopback) will cause wrong routing definitions as the DU's network interface is not intended for localhost, resulting in unreachable elements and connection failures.
